author: {'steamid': '76561198349438539', 'num_games_owned': 449, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1584890024}
review: I just got Lyra recently, and while I play no instruments, I do love music. What's most amazing about this game is that I’m able to make exactly what I imagine right off the bat with some experimentation. It’s pretty surreal. Really glad I bought it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198855752929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1573150020}
review:
Alright.
This program is MUCH better then what i've expected.
If you are someone who is a professional or a semiprofessional musician or want-to-be musician and you own a VR headset, you should definitely get it. Even if you are not (and I am not), I really enjoyed creating my own little tunes and mixing them and rotating them and doing all sort of manipulations.
You can choose different instruments, different rhythms, there is a library of prerecorded mixes, you can change pitch and pace and many other things to which I don't know the professional names for. But its good. Its real good.
10/10 for this category of product.

author: {'steamid': '76561198289499914', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1565162851}
review:
作为一个音乐工作者和VR用户，这个应用给我带来的新鲜感只有一个小时，谜一样的循环判定，迷一样的管线设计，BPM设定也极为复杂。

        音色也少的可怜，唯一的鼓组音色难听的一P。因为只有两个手柄，所以控制器也只能够打简单的旋律，并且还是步进录音，意味着如果是录鼓的话，每一拍都必须得被占满不可以有空拍。

        这个玩意儿的最佳玩法是import里面的LOOP，然后用start NODE 多链接几个，基本上一首曲子就成型了，然后随便敲几下自带的音色，装个样子感觉好像在搞曲子。。对了还有一个极其致命，就是延迟问题，所以敲几下音色都敲不准。。。

        官方视频在用了一段LOOP铺底的情况下都无法演奏出一首像样的作品来，我是被VR音乐制作懵逼了双眼买了这个玩意儿

author: {'steamid': '76561198073330273', 'num_games_owned': 2110, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1584885434}
review:
Sehr nette Sound Software 
Positives: 
schon jetzt nach rund 2h kann ich sagen das es sich lohnt 
einfaches Handling 
gutes überschaubares Menü 
guter Sound keine Verzögerungen bemerkt 
keine Bugs bemerkt 
es macht auf jeden fall Spaß  

Negatives:
derzeit nicht so viele Effekte auch die Sound Auswahl ist überschaubar 
Tutorial ist derzeit wohl mehr Platzhalter als wirklich Tutorial ich hab noch nie so wenig aus einem Tutorial lernen können 
Import von eigenen Sound geht nicht innerhalb von LyraVR ( Seperat die WAV. Datein in den StreamingAssets/LyraFilesToCopyToUserDocuments kopieren 

(natürlich nicht zu vergleichen mit bekannten Programmen wie Fruity Loop Qbase oder ähnlichem )

was ich mir wünschen würde :

direckteres steuern der Grundfunktionen wie Lautstärke Balance usw (wegen mir ein seperates fester )
mehr Effekte u Sounds
bessere tutorials
Import und Sortierungsmöglichkeit innerhalb von LyraVR von Sounds (alle im selben Ordner ist irgendwann unübersichtlich bei mir zbsp 36gb wav Sounds  )

👑 Powered by HoI 4 Deu Curators group in German / English 👑
⠀⠀⠀🎉 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/30388691/] 
Follow [/url]

Engl.

Very nice sound software
positive:
After about 2 hours I can say that it's worth it
Easy to use
good manageable menu
Good sound, no delays
No bugs noticed
It's definitely fun

Negative:
currently not so many effects and the sound selection is manageable
Tutorial is currently probably more wildcard than really tutorial I have never been able to learn so little from a tutorial
Importing your own sound is not possible in LyraVR (separate the WAV files in the StreamingAssets/LyraFilesToCopyToUserDocuments 
(Of course, not comparable to known programs like Fruity Loop Qbase or similar)

what I would wish for:

more direct control of the basic functions like volume balance etc. (because of me a separate solid)
more effects and sounds
better tutorials
Importing and sorting sounds in LyraVR (all in the same folder are sometimes confusing to me, eg 36 GB WAV sounds)

author: {'steamid': '76561198066590240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2800, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1511922515}
review:
So I got this game on the Black Friday deal for $11.99.  I think you are getting a good value for the price.  It's also in Early Access development, so it has chance to work on it's current limitations.  The dev is actively supporting the game so that's always good to see in EA.  If you love music creation and VR, this is a must download, even at normal price.

[b][u] Positives [/u][/b]
+ easy to create music right away
+ mostly nice sounds
+ lots of options, especially for this price point
+ ability to save,  import sounds
+ some nice instrument sounds and drums

[b][u] Negatives [/u][/b]
- you're limited to single notes or dyads (two-note chords)
- clunky controls when trying to create anything but the simplest compositions, especially on Touch controllers
- tutorial not really helpful
- needs more instruments

I think for $14.99 you'd be hard pressed to get a better music making app.  I'm just not sure if it's really easier to create something professional sounding with this app versus a real dedicated 2D app ...  At least not yet, but I hope it gets there.  But it is easy and fun to experiment within this app.

Rating 7/10 very nice start .. hope it improves even more ... my wish list is for the ability to use our VR hands on the virtual keyboard controllers versus using the motion controllers as vritual mallets on the virtual keyboard controller

author: {'steamid': '76561197993697901', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1514489499}
review:
This is the best musical creation VR tool I have used.   You can create music in several ways.  One is in the from a building a connected graph of notes which can be triggered as a sequence or a sequence triggered by a loop.  each node in the graph pcan be played individually as well.  You can edit Pitch and Volume.   

It is priced fairly and seems likely to improve.

To the developer:   Features I would love.

1.  The ability to set up a default pallet for pitch colors ( I use modified scribian color scheme to sight read by color)
    a.  this would allow me to arrange a graph in circle of fifths pattern
2.  The ability to set up a default pallet of mesh nodes shapes to show - position in scale. 

3.  ability to control triggers and possibly input using midi controllers.

Please feel free to reach out for more feedback and ideas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017007749', 'num_games_owned': 807, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1552779323}
review: Totally worth it. The whole family likes it. Very easy learning curve, and those with little or no musical talent can make tunes after a 5 min tutorial.  It's one of those titles you should probably have as part of your VR repertoire.

author: {'steamid': '76561198264128255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1518794157}
review:
It's an interesting music making app!  It's a 3D xylophone, and you can sequence / compose melodies also.
If that sounds like fun, you should buy this app.

It's made for Vive, but it can partly work on Rift also.  ( Probably full compatibility will come later. )

YouTube First Look  ( Subscribe for more unusual music tech! )
https://youtu.be/_8d83seyK_g

author: {'steamid': '76561197961914427', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1516497004}
review: This thing is awesome. I'm not very musically-inclined whatsoever. I don't know how to play any instruments but I feel as though I'm not tone deaf so I can slowly piece my own renditions of songs together myself. This app is perfect and well-laid out. You can move anything around, scale it, easily modify notes and delays between each note, and record to .wav. Lots of options for how to set up and layer your music. Very cool app. I look forward to see what's added in the future!

author: {'steamid': '76561198301541977', 'num_games_owned': 732, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1556003434}
review:
一个音乐创作的VR应用有中文版，很难得，游戏内的教程也很友好，基本操作很容易上手，当然，要精通就要看官方的视频教程和不断摸索了。

这应用有潜力成为VR音乐创作应用领域的Tilt Brush，就算没音乐细胞，瞎玩也能鼓捣出各种奇怪的音乐。以后在视觉上做得更精致更华丽后，那就可以创作能看的美丽音乐了，真是音乐视觉艺术。

author: {'steamid': '76561197967050137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1664999325}
review:
YEESSSSSSS!!! Oh man, i love it.

If you've ever played Electroplankton for NDS it has a similar vibe. However, unlike Electroplankton, beneath the surface there's a depth to Lyra's capabilities that excites me. This won't replace your DAW anytime soon but I can imagine a whole host of ways it could be very useful - if not for traditional studio work DEFINITELY for some sort of musical VR soundscape experiences we've yet to see. I'm very excited to see where the devs take this. 

Currently there's a few CONS that stuck out immedietly:

- Clunky Controls
- Tutorial barely covers whats possible - It took some fumbling around to figure out that it has some powerful tools
- Can't explore from in game my own sound libraries? (or couldn't figure out how)

However the PROS outweight cons:

- Polished and pretty
- Little/no latency when triggering audio/samples
- Visuals are crisp and clear (1080Ti, no supersampling)
- As is powerful enough to make interesting and enjoyable music.
- Fun


Absolute MUST BUY for 9.99 if you enjoy sound/music.
